column1: Smoque BBQ////Others at the table got brisket (thumbs up) and someone got the fries
column2: which came in a mini brown bag that soon became grease-soaked. They were regular-sized fries
column3: just simple tossed in like salt and pepper
column4: but still had the skin on. And they were fried to perfection. As we finished one by one
column5: some guy came by and took away some of our trays for us.
